content: If you want to advance to the main boss, the large stairway on the other side of the building will lead you to the Inner Courtyard, but there's another optional side path to explore first, on the opposite side as the other optional path we explored earlier.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
If you want to advance to the main boss, the large stairway on the other side of the building will lead you to the Inner Courtyard, but there's another optional side path to explore first, on the opposite side as the other optional path we explored earlier.
